fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scope out someone during the day.
- Fire your gun at someone, dealing an Astral Basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone visits the target that you try to shoot, you will stay home. This does not apply if you are shooting a scoped target.
- You may not scope someone out Day 1.
- You may not shoot Night 1.
- All of your attacks dealt to scoped targets are Unstoppable.
- If a scoped target attacks you, you will stay home and shoot them instead. This works against Astral attacks as well.
